typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsource
source(output(
		Deptno as integer,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptnosource
empsource, deptnosource exists(empsource@DEPTNO == deptnosource@Deptno,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 split(DEPTNO==10,
	DEPTNO==20,
	DEPTNO==30,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DEPTNO10, DEPTNO20, DEPTNO30, OTHERDEPARTMENTS)
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTNO20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['deptno20.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> targetdeptno20
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTNO10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['department10.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> targetdeptno10
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTNO30 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['deptno30.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> targetdeptno30
ConditionalSplit1@OTHERDEPARTMENTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['otherdata.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
